title: Mom who lost 2 sons to opioid epidemic talks to Nancy
itunes:title: Mom who lost 2 sons to opioid epidemic talks to Nancy
description:
The opioid crisis in the USA has been declared a national emergency, with more people dying from overdoses than car crashes. For Rebecca Savage, it claimed her 2 teenage sons and launched her on a mission. The mother visits with Nancy Grace to discuss her loss and the campaign she is now waging. American Narcan author Dr. William Marrone and psychologist Caryn Stark join the discussion.
